name: FixArmature.desc
en_US:
Automatically:
- Reparents bones
- Removes unnecessary bones, objects, groups & constraints
- Translates and renames bones & objects
- Merges weight paints
- Corrects the hips
- Joins meshes
- Converts morphs into shapes
- Corrects shading
ko_KR:
자동으로 아래의 항목들이 고쳐집니다:
- 본들의 부모 재설정
- 필요하지 않는 본들, 오브젝트들, 그룹들과 컨스트레인트들을 제거
- 본들과 오브젝트들을 영어로 번역하고 이름들을 바꿈
- 웨이트 페인트들을 통합
- 'hips'본을 고침
- 메쉬 통합
- morphs를 shapes로 변환
- 쉐이딩을 고침
zh_CN:
自动地：
- 重生骨头
- 删除不必要的骨骼、对象、组和约束
- 翻译和重命名骨骼和对象
- 合并权重涂料
- 矫正臀部
- 加入网格
- 将变形转换为形状
- 修正阴影

zh_CN: 姿势成功保存为形态键。

name: PoseToRest.label
ja_JP: レストポーズとして適用する

name: PoseToRest.desc
en_US: This applies the current pose position as the new rest position.
ko_KR: 이것은 현재 포즈를 새로운 기본 포즈로 적용합니다.
zh_CN:
这会将当前姿势位置应用为新的静止位置。

en_US: Pose successfully applied as rest pose.
zh_CN: 姿势成功应用为默认位置。

name: JoinMeshes.desc
en_US:
Joins all meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Reorders all shape keys correctly
  - Applies all transforms
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly
ko_KR:
모델의 모든 메쉬들을 통합시킵니다.
또한:
  - 모든 쉐이프키들의 순서를 올바르게 재설정합니다.
  - 모든 변환(Transforms)을 적용
  - 망가진 아마추어 모디파이어들(armature modifiers)을 고침
  - 모든 데시메이션(decimation)과 미러 모디파이어들(mirror modifiers)을 적용
  - UV맵들을 올바르게 통합
zh_CN:
将此模型的所有网格连接在一起。
它也是：
- 正确重新排序所有形态键
- 应用所有变换
- 修复损坏的骨架修改器
- 应用所有精简和镜像修改器
- 正确合并 UV 贴图

name: JoinMeshesSelected.label
ja_JP: 選択したメッシュを結合する

name: JoinMeshesSelected.desc
en_US:
Joins all selected meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Reorders all shape keys correctly
  - Applies all transforms
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly
ko_KR:
모델의 모든 메쉬들을 통합시킵니다.
또한:
  - 모든 쉐이프키들의 순서를 올바르게 재설정합니다.
  - 모든 변환(Transforms)을 적용
  - 망가진 아마추어 모디파이어들(armature modifiers)을 고침
  - 모든 데시메이션(decimation)과 미러 모디파이어들(mirror modifiers)을 적용
  - UV맵들을 올바르게 통합
zh_CN:
将此模型的所有选定网格连接在一起。
它也是：
- 正确重新排序所有形态键
- 应用所有变换
- 修复损坏的骨架修改器
- 应用所有精简和镜像修改器
- 正确合并 UV 贴图

name: JoinMeshesSelected.error.noSelect
en_US: No meshes selected! Please select the meshes you want to join in the hierarchy!
ko_KR: 선택된 메쉬들이 없습니다! 합치고 싶은 메쉬들을 계층(Hierarchy) 창에서 선택해주세요!

name: JoinMeshesSelected.error.cantJoin
en_US: Selected meshes could not be joined!

name: SeparateByMaterials.desc
en_US:
Separates selected mesh by materials.

Warning: Never decimate something where you might need the shape keys later (face, mouth, eyes..)
ko_KR:
선택된 메쉬를 매테리얼 별로 나눕니다.

경고: 나중에 쉐이프키가 필요한 것들은 절대 데시메이트하지 마십시오. (얼굴, 입, 눈 등..)
zh_CN:
按材质分离选定的网格。

警告：永远不要在以后可能需要形态键的地方（面部、嘴巴、眼睛......）

name: SeparateByLooseParts.label
ja_JP: ルーズパーツに分離する

name: SeparateByLooseParts.desc
en_US:
Separates selected mesh by loose parts.
This acts like separating by materials but creates more meshes for more precision
ko_KR:
선택된 메쉬를 느슨한 부분들별로 나눕니다.
이것은 매테리얼별로 분리시키는 것과 같지만 보다 높은 정확도를 위해 더 많은 메쉬들을 만듭니다
zh_CN:
通过松散的部分分隔选定的网格。
这就像按材质分离一样，但会创建更多网格以获得更高的精度

name: SeparateByLooseParts.success
zh_CN: 被松散的零件成功分离。

name: SeparateByShapekeys.label
ja_JP: シェイプキーに区切る

name: SeparateByShapekeys.desc
en_US:
Separates selected mesh into two parts,
depending on whether it is effected by a shape key or not.

Very useful for manual decimation
ko_KR:
선택된 메쉬를 두 부분으로 나누는데,
쉐이프키에 의해 영향을 받는지 여부에 따라 결정됩니다.

수동으로 데시메이션을 할 시 매우 유용합니다
zh_CN:
将选定的网格分成两部分，
取决于它是否受形态键的影响。

对于手动精简非常有用

name: SeparateByCopyProtection.label
ja_JP: コピープロテクションに分離する

name: SeparateByCopyProtection.desc
en_US:
Separates selected mesh into two parts,
depending on whether it is effected by the Cats Copy Protection or not.

Useful if you have the Copy Protection enabled on multiple selected parts of your model
ko_KR:
선택된 메쉬를 두 부분으로 나누는데,
Cats의 복사핵 방지의 영향을 받는지 여부에 따라 결정됩니다.

모델의 여러 부분에서 복사 방지를 활성화 한 경우 유용합니다.
zh_CN:
将选定的网格分成两部分，
取决于它是否受 Cats Copy Protection 的影响。

如果您在模型的多个选定部分上启用了复制保护，则很有用

name: SeparateByX.error.multipleMesh
en_US:
Multiple meshes found!
Please select the mesh you want to separate!
ko_KR:
여러 메쉬들이 발견됨!
나누고 싶은 메쉬를 선택해주세요!
zh_CN:
找到多个网格！
请选择您要分离的网格！

name: SeparateByX.warn.noSeparation
en_US: No meshes had to be separated!

name: MergeWeights.label
ja_JP: 親に重みをマージする

name: MergeWeights.desc
en_US:
Deletes the selected bones and adds their weight to their respective parents.

Only available in Edit or Pose Mode with bones selected
zh_CN:
删除选定的骨骼并将它们的权重添加到它们各自的父级。

仅在选定骨骼的编辑或姿势模式下可用

name: MergeWeights.success
en_US: Deleted {number} bones and added their weights to their parents.
zh_CN: 删除了 {number} 个骨骼并将它们的权重添加到它们的父级。

name: MergeWeightsToActive.label
ja_JP: ウェイトをアクティブ にマージする

name: MergeWeightsToActive.desc
en_US:
Deletes the selected bones except the active one and adds their weights to the active bone.
The active bone is the one you selected last.

Only available in Edit or Pose Mode with bones selected
zh_CN:
删除除活动骨骼之外的选定骨骼，并将它们的权重添加到活动骨骼。
活动骨骼是您最后选择的骨骼。

仅在选定骨骼的编辑或姿势模式下可用

name: MergeWeightsToActive.success
en_US: Deleted {number} bones and added their weights to the active bone.
zh_CN: 删除了 {number} 个骨骼并将它们的权重添加到活动骨骼。

name: ApplyTransformations.desc
en_US: Applies the position, rotation and scale to the armature and it's meshes
zh_CN: 将位置、旋转和比例应用于骨架及其网格

name: ApplyAllTransformations.label
ja_JP: すべての変換を適用する

name: ApplyAllTransformations.desc
en_US: Applies the position, rotation and scale of all objects
zh_CN: 应用所有对象的位置、旋转和缩放

name: RemoveZeroWeightBones.label
ja_JP: ゼロ ウェイト ボーンを削除する

name: RemoveZeroWeightBones.desc
en_US:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices
Don't use this if you plan to use 'Fix Model'
zh_CN:
清理骨骼层次，删除所有不直接影响任何顶点的骨骼
如果您打算使用"修复模型"，请不要使用它

name: RemoveZeroWeightBones.success
zh_CN: 删除了 {number} 个零权重骨骼。

name: RemoveZeroWeightGroups.label
ja_JP: ゼロ ウェイトの頂点グループを削除

name: RemoveZeroWeightGroups.desc
en_US: Cleans up the vertex groups of all meshes, deleting all groups that don't directly affect any vertices
zh_CN: 清理所有网格的顶点组，删除所有不直接影响任何顶点的组

name: RemoveZeroWeightGroups.success
zh_CN: 删除了 {number} 个零权重顶点组。

name: RemoveConstraints.desc
en_US: Removes constrains between bones causing specific bone movement as these are not used by VRChat
zh_CN: 移除导致特定骨骼移动的骨骼之间的约束，因为 VRChat 不使用这些约束

name: RecalculateNormals.desc
en_US:
Makes normals point inside of the selected mesh.

Don't use this on good looking meshes as this can screw them up.
Use this if there are random inverted or darker faces on the mesh
zh_CN:
使法线指向选定网格的内部。

不要在好看的网格上使用它，因为这会搞砸它们。
如果网格上有随机倒置或较暗的面，请使用此选项

name: FlipNormals.desc
en_US:
Flips the direction of the faces' normals of the selected mesh.
Use this if all normals are inverted
zh_CN:
翻转选定网格的面法线方向。
如果所有法线都反转，请使用此选项

name: RemoveDoubles.desc
en_US:
Merges duplicated faces and vertices of the selected meshes.
This is more safe than doing it manually:
  - leaves shape keys completely untouched
  - but removes less doubles overall
ko_KR:
선택한 메시의 중복 면들(faces)과 점(vertices)을 병합합니다.
This is more safe than doing it manually:
  - leaves shape keys completely untouched
  - but removes less doubles overall
zh_CN:
合并选定网格的重复面和顶点。
这比手动操作更安全：
- 完全保持形态键不变
- 但总体上去除的重叠较少

name: RemoveDoublesNormal.label
ja_JP: ダブルを通常どおりに削除する

name: RemoveDoublesNormal.desc
en_US:
Merges duplicated faces and vertices of the selected meshes.
This is exactly like doing it manually
ko_KR:
선택한 메시의 중복 면들(faces)과 점(vertices)을 병합합니다.
This is exactly like doing it manually
zh_CN:
合并选定网格的重复面和顶点。
这就像手动做一样

name: FixVRMShapesButton.label
ja_JP: コイカツシェイプキーを修正

name: FixVRMShapesButton.desc
en_US: Fixes the shapekeys of Koikatsu models
zh_CN: 修复了 Koikatsu 模型的形态键

name: FixVRMShapesButton.success
zh_CN: 修复了 VRM 形态键。

en_US:
WARNING: This fix is no longer needed for VRChat, you should not use it!

Applies a general fix for Full Body Tracking.
Ignore the "Spine length zero" warning in Unity
zh_CN:
警告：VRChat 不再需要此修复程序，您不应使用它！

对全身跟踪应用一般修复。
忽略 Unity 中的"Spine length zero"警告

name: FixFBTButton.error.bonesNotFound
en_US:
Required bones could not be found!
Please make sure that your armature contains the following bones:
 - Hips, Spine, Left leg, Right leg
Exact names are required!
zh_CN:
找不到所需的骨头！
请确保您的骨架包含以下骨骼：
- 臀部、脊柱、左腿、右腿
需要准确的名字！

name: FixFBTButton.error.alreadyApplied
en_US: Full Body Tracking Fix already applied!

name: FixFBTButton.success
en_US: Successfully applied the Full Body Tracking fix.
zh_CN: 成功应用全身追踪修复。

name: RemoveFBTButton.label
ja_JP: 全身追跡の修正を削除

name: RemoveFBTButton.desc
en_US:
Removes the fix for Full Body Tracking, since it is no longer advised to use it.

Requires bones:
 - Hips, Spine, Left leg, Right leg, Left leg 2, Right leg 2
zh_CN:
移除全身追踪的修复，因为不再建议使用它。

需要骨头：
- 臀部、脊柱、左腿、右腿、左腿 2、右腿 2

name: RemoveFBTButton.error.bonesNotFound
en_US:
Required bones could not be found!
Please make sure that your armature contains the following bones:
 - Hips, Spine, Left leg, Right leg, Left leg 2, Right leg 2
Exact names are required!
zh_CN:
找不到所需的骨头！
请确保您的骨架包含以下骨骼：
- 臀部、脊柱、左腿、右腿、左腿 2、右腿 2

name: RemoveFBTButton.error.notApplied

name: RemoveFBTButton.success
en_US: Successfully removed the Full Body Tracking fix.
zh_CN: 成功移除全身追踪修复。

name: DuplicateBonesButton.desc
en_US: Duplicates the selected bones including their weight and renames them to _L and _R
zh_CN: 复制选定的骨骼，包括它们的权重，并将它们重命名为 _L 和 _R

name: MergeArmature.desc
en_US:
Merges the selected merge armature into the base armature.
You should fix both armatures with Cats first.
Only move the mesh of the merge armature to the desired position, the bones will be moved automatically
zh_CN:
将选定的合并骨架合并到基础骨架中。
您应该先用 Cats 修复两个骨架。
仅将合并骨架的网格移动到所需位置，骨骼将自动移动

name: MergeArmature.error.notFound
en_US: The armature "{name}" could not be found.

name: MergeArmature.error.checkTransforms
en_US:
Please make sure that the parent of the merge armature has the following transforms:
 - Location at 0
 - Rotation at 0
 - Scale at 1

name: MergeArmature.error.pleaseFix
en_US:
Please use the "Fix Model" feature on the selected armatures first!
Make sure to select the armature you want to fix above the "Fix Model" button!
After that please only move the mesh (not the armature!) to the desired position.

name: AttachMesh.desc
en_US:
Attaches the selected mesh to the selected bone of the selected armature.

INFO: The mesh will only be assigned to the selected bone.
E.g.: A jacket won't work, because it requires multiple bones

name: AttachMesh.success
zh_CN: 网格已成功连接到骨架。

name: merge_armatures.error.transformReset
en_US:
If you want to rotate the new part, only modify the mesh instead of the armature,
or select "Apply Transforms"!

The transforms of the merge armature got reset and the mesh you have to modify got selected.
Now place this selected mesh where and how you want it to be and then merge the armatures again.
If you don't want that, undo this operation.
zh_CN:
如果要旋转新零件，只修改网格而不是骨架，
或选择"应用变换"！

合并骨架的变换被重置，您必须修改的网格被选中。
现在将此选定的网格放置在您想要的位置和方式，然后再次合并骨架。
如果您不想这样做，请撤消此操作。

name: merge_armatures.error.pleaseUndo
en_US: Something went wrong! Please undo, check your selections and try again.
zh_CN: 出问题了！ 请撤消，检查您的选择，然后重试。

ja_JP: マテリアルコンバイナを有効にする

en_US:
Protects your model from piracy. NOT a 100% safe protection!
Read the documentation before use
zh_CN:
保护您的模型免受盗版。 不是 100% 安全的保护！
使用前阅读文档

name: CopyProtectionDisable.desc
en_US: Removes the copy protections from this model.
zh_CN: 删除此模型的复制保护。

name: ForumButton.label
ja_JP: フォーラムに移動する

name: ScanButton.label
ja_JP: デシメーション モデルのスキャン

name: AddShapeButton.desc
en_US:
Adds the selected shape key to the whitelist.
This means that every mesh containing that shape key will be not decimated.

name: AddMeshButton.desc
en_US:
Adds the selected mesh to the whitelist.
This means that this mesh will be not decimated.
zh_CN:
将选定的网格添加到白名单。
这意味着该网格不会被精简。

name: RemoveShapeButton.desc
en_US:
Removes the selected shape key from the whitelist.
This means that this shape key is no longer decimation safe!
zh_CN:
从白名单中删除选定的形态键。
这意味着这个形态键不再是精简安全的！

name: RemoveMeshButton.desc
en_US:
Removes the selected mesh from the whitelist.
This means that this mesh will be decimated.
zh_CN:
从白名单中删除选定的网格。
这意味着该网格将被精简。

name: AutoDecimateButton.desc
en_US:
This will automatically decimate your model while preserving the shape keys.
You should manually remove unimportant meshes first.
zh_CN:
这将在保留形状键的同时自动抽取您的模型。
您应该首先手动删除不重要的网格。

name: decimate.cantDecimateWithSettings
en_US: This model can not be decimated to {number} tris with the specified settings.
zh_CN: 使用指定的设置，此模型无法抽取到 {number} 个面。

en_US: Try to use Custom, Half or Full Decimation.
zh_CN: 尝试使用自定义、半或全抽取。

zh_CN: 选择更少的形状键和/或网格或使用完全抽取。

en_US: Disable 'Save Fingers' or increase the Tris Count.

en_US: The model already has less than {number} tris. Nothing had to be decimated.

name: CreateEyesButton.label
ja_JP: アイトラッキングを作成する

name: CreateEyesButton.desc
en_US:
This will let you track someone when they come close to you and it enables blinking.
You should do decimation before this operation.
Test the resulting eye movement in the 'Testing' tab.
ko_KR:
누군가가 가까이 왔을 때 그 사람을 추적 할 수 있고 눈 깜박임을 가능하게합니다.
데시메이션이 필요하다면 이 작업 이전에 해야합니다.
눈 움직임을 'Testing' 탭에서 테스트하세요.
zh_CN:
这将让您在某人靠近您时跟踪他们并启用闪烁。
您应该在此操作之前进行精简。
在"测试"选项卡中测试由此产生的眼睛移动。

name: CreateEyesButton.error.noShapeSelected
en_US:
You have no shape keys selected.
Please choose a mesh containing shape keys or check "Disable Eye Blinking".
ko_KR:
선택된 쉐이프키가 없습니다.
쉐이프키가 포함 된 메쉬를 선택하거나 "눈 깜빡임 비활성화"에 체크하세요.
zh_CN:
您没有选择任何形态键。
请选择包含形态键的网格或选中"禁用眼睛闪烁"。

name: CreateEyesButton.error.noVertex
en_US:

This means that Google changed their API and translations will no longer work until this is fixed.
Please translate manually or wait for an CATS update.
For updates and dicussions please join our Discord. The link can be found in the Credits panel down below.
ko_KR:
Google 번역에서 번역을 가져올 수 없습니다!
이는 Google이 API를 변경했으며 문제가 해결 될 때까지 번역이 더 이상 작동하지 않음을 의미합니다.
수동으로 번역하거나 Cats 업데이트를 기다리십시오.
업데이트 및 토론을 원하시면 Discord에 가입해주세요. 링크는 아래의 크레딧 패널에서 찾을 수 있습니다.
zh_CN:
无法从谷歌翻译获得翻译！
这意味着 Google 更改了他们的 API，在此问题修复之前，翻译将不再有效。
请手动翻译或等待 CATS 更新。
如需更新和讨论，请加入我们的 Discord。 该链接可以在下方的 Credits 面板中找到。

name: AutoVisemeButton.desc
en_US:
This will give your avatar the ability to mimic each sound that comes from your mouth by blending between various shapes to mimic your actual voice.
It will generate 15 shape keys from the 3 shape keys you specify
ko_KR:
당신의 아바타가 다양한 쉐이프키들을 조합하여 실제 음성을 모방하여 말하는 것처럼 보이게 합니다.
3개의 쉐이프키를 지정하여 새로운 15 종류의 쉐이프키들을 생성합니다.
zh_CN:
这将使您的化身能够通过混合各种形状来模仿您的实际声音来模仿来自您嘴巴的每种声音。
它将从您指定的 3 个形态键中生成 15 个形态键

name: AutoVisemeButton.error.selectShapekeys
en_US: Please select the correct mouth shapekeys instead of "Basis"!
ko_KR: "Basis" 대신에 올바른 입모양 쉐이프키들을 선택하여 주세요!
zh_CN: 请选择正确的嘴形键而不是"基础"！

name: Scene.armature.desc
en_US: Select the armature which will be used by Cats
zh_CN: 选择 Cats 将使用的骨架

name: Scene.zip_content.label
ja_JP: コンテンツを圧縮する

name: Scene.zip_content.desc
en_US: Select the model you want to import

name: Scene.keep_upper_chest.desc
en_US:
VRChat now partially supports the Upper Chest bone, so deleting it is no longer necessary.

Uncheck this if you are going to use the legacy SDK2 avatar system. Most people can leave this on.
ko_KR:
VRChat은 이제 상단 가슴(Upper Chest) 본을 부분적으로 지원하므로 더 이상 삭제할 필요가 없습니다.

경고: 현재 이것은 눈 추적(Eye Tracking)을 망치기 때문에, 눈 추적을 원한다면 이것을 체크하지 말아주세요.
zh_CN:
VRChat 现在部分支持上胸部骨骼，因此不再需要删除它。

警告：目前这会破坏眼睛追踪，因此如果您想要眼睛追踪，请不要勾选此项

name: Scene.combine_mats.label
ja_JP: 同じマテリアルを組み合わせる

name: Scene.combine_mats.desc
en_US:
Combines similar materials into one, reducing draw calls.

Your avatar should visibly look the same after this operation.
This is a very important step for optimizing your avatar.
If you have problems with this, uncheck this option and tell us!
ko_KR:
유사한 매테리얼들을 하나로 결합하여 드로우 콜을 줄입니다.

이 작업 후에도 아바타는 동일하게 보일 것입니다.
이것은 아바타를 최적화하는 데 매우 중요한 단계입니다.
이것에 문제가 있으면이 옵션을 선택 취소하고 우리에게 알려주세요!
zh_CN:
将相似的材质合二为一，减少绘图调用。

完成此操作后，您的头像应该看起来相同。
这是优化头像的一个非常重要的步骤。
如果您对此有疑问，请取消选中此选项并告诉我们！

name: Scene.remove_zero_weight.label
ja_JP: ゼロウェイトボーンを削除する

name: Scene.remove_zero_weight.desc
en_US:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices.
Uncheck this if bones or vertex groups that you want to keep got deleted
ko_KR:
본 구조를 정리하고 어느 Vertex에도 영향을 주지 않는 모든 본들을 지웁니다.
유지하려는 본들이나 버텍스 그룹이 지워질 경우 체크해제하세요
zh_CN:
清理骨骼层次，删除所有不直接影响任何顶点的骨骼。
如果要保留的骨骼或顶点组被删除，请取消选中此选项

name: Scene.keep_end_bones.desc
en_US:
Saves end bones from deletion.

This can improve skirt movement for dynamic bones, but increases the bone count.
This can also fix issues with crumbled finger bones in Unity.
Make sure to always uncheck "Add Leaf Bones" when exporting or use the CATS export button
ko_KR:
엔드 본들을 유지합니다.

다이나믹본을 사용하는 스커트의 움직임을 향상시키지만 본의 개수를 늘려버립니다.
이것은 Unity에서 부서진 손가락 뼈들과 관련된 문제를 해결할 수도 있습니다.
내보내기 할때는 언제나 "Add Leaf Bones"을 체크해제하거나 Cats의 내보내기(Export) 버튼을 사용하세요
zh_CN:
从删除中保存末端骨骼。

这可以改善动态骨骼的裙子移动，但会增加骨骼数量。
这也可以解决 Unity 中手指骨头碎裂的问题。
确保在导出或使用 CATS 导出按钮时始终取消选中"添加叶骨"

name: Scene.keep_twist_bones.label
ja_JP: ツイストボーンを保持

name: Scene.keep_twist_bones.desc
en_US:
This will keep any bone with "Twist" in the name.
So if there are certain bones that you want to keep, you can add "Twist" to them and they won't get deleted.

VRChat can now make use of twist bones, so you can use this option to keep them
ko_KR:
이름에 "Twist"가 들어간 본들을 유지합니다.
따라서 유지하려는 특정 뼈가있는 경우 이름에 "Twist"를 추가 할 수 있으며 삭제되지 않습니다.

VRChat은 이제 트위스트 본을 사용할 수 있으므로 이 옵션을 사용하여 유지할 수 있습니다.
zh_CN:
这将保留名称中带有"Twist"的任何骨骼。
因此，如果您想保留某些骨骼，您可以向它们添加"Twist"，它们不会被删除。

VRChat 现在可以使用扭曲骨骼，因此您可以使用此选项来保留它们

name: Scene.fix_twist_bones.label
ja_JP: MMDツイスト ボーンを修正する
zh_CN: 修复 MMD 扭曲骨头

name: Scene.fix_twist_bones.desc
en_US:
This will make MMD arm twist bones usable in VRChat.
WIll only work if the twist bones are properly named.
Required names:
  - ArmTwist[1-3]_[L/R]
  - HandTwist[1-3]_[L/R]

You don't need to enable "Keep Twist Bones" for this to work
ko_KR:
VRChat에서 MMD 팔 트위스트 뼈대를 사용할 수 있습니다.
트위스트 본의 이름이 올바르게 지정된 경우에만 작동합니다.
필요한 이름형식:
  - ArmTwist[1-3]_[L/R]
  - HandTwist[1-3]_[L/R]

이 작업을 위해 "Keep Twist Bones"를 활성화 할 필요가 없습니다.
zh_CN:
这将使 MMD 手臂扭曲骨骼在 VRChat 中可用。
只有正确命名扭曲骨骼时才会起作用。
必填名称：
- ArmTwist[1-3]_[L/R]
- HandTwist[1-3]_[L/R]

您无需启用"保持扭曲骨骼"即可使用

name: Scene.join_meshes.desc
en_US:
Joins all meshes of this model together.
It also:
  - Applies all transformations
  - Repairs broken armature modifiers
  - Applies all decimation and mirror modifiers
  - Merges UV maps correctly

INFO: You should always join your meshes
ko_KR:
모델의 모든 메쉬들을 통합합니다.
또한:
  - 모든 쉐이프키들의 순서를 올바르게 재설정합니다.
  - 모든 변환(Transforms)을 적용
  - 망가진 아마추어 모디파이어들(armature modifiers)을 고침
  - 모든 데시메이션(decimation)과 미러 모디파이어들(mirror modifiers)을 적용
  - UV맵들을 올바르게 통합
zh_CN:
将此模型的所有网格连接在一起。
它也是：
- 应用所有转换
- 修复损坏的电枢修改器
- 应用所有精简和镜像修改器
- 正确合并 UV 贴图

信息：您应该始终加入您的网格

name: Scene.connect_bones.desc
en_US:
This connects all bones to their child bone if they have exactly one child bone.
This will not change how the bones function in any way, it just improves the aesthetic of the armature
ko_KR:
모든 본들이 정확히 하나의 자식 본을 가지고 있다면 모든 본들을 그것들의 자식 본과 연결시켜줍니다.
뼈의 기능에는 영향을 주지 않으며 뼈대(armature)의 미관을 개선할 뿐입니다.
zh_CN:
如果它们只有一个子骨骼，这会将所有骨骼连接到它们的子骨骼。
这不会以任何方式改变骨骼的功能，它只会提高骨架的美感

name: Scene.fix_materials.label
ja_JP: マテリアルを修正する

name: Scene.fix_materials.desc
en_US: This will apply some VRChat related fixes to materials
ko_KR: 매테리얼에 일부 VRChat 관련 픽스가 적용됩니다.
zh_CN: 这将对材质应用一些与 VRChat 相关的修复

name: Scene.remove_rigidbodies_joints.label
ja_JP: リジッドボディとジョイントを除去

name: Scene.remove_rigidbodies_joints.desc
en_US:
Rigidbodies and joints are used by MMD software to simulate physics.
They are completely useless for VRChat, so removing them is recommended for VRChat users!
ko_KR:
Rigidbodies와 joints는 MMD software에서 물리연산을 위해 사용되는 것들입니다.
VRChat에 사용되지않으므로 VRChat 유저들에게는 이것들을 지우는 게 좋습니다!
zh_CN:
MMD 软件使用刚体和关节来模拟物理。
它们对 VRChat 完全没用，因此建议 VRChat 用户删除它们！

name: Scene.use_google_only.label
ja_JP: 古い翻訳を使用する(推奨しません)

name: Scene.use_google_only.desc
en_US:
Ignores the internal dictionary and only uses the Google Translator for shape key translations.

This will result in slower translation speed and worse translations, but the translations will be like in CATS version 0.9.0 and older.
Only use this if you have animations which rely on the old translations and you don't want to convert them to the new ones
ko_KR:
내장된 사전 대신에 구글 번역기를 쉐이프키 번역에 사용합니다.

번역 속도가 느려지고 번역의 질이 더 나빠질 수 있지만, 번역은 CATS 0.9.0 버전 혹은 그 이전의 버전처럼 될 것이다.
이전 번역에 의존하는 애니메이션을 새 번역으로 변환하지 않을 경우에만 이 기능을 사용하세요.
zh_CN:
忽略内部字典，只使用谷歌翻译器进行形态键翻译。

这将导致翻译速度变慢和翻译效果变差，但翻译将与 CATS 版本 0.9.0 及更早版本相同。
仅当您的动画依赖于旧翻译并且您不想将它们转换为新翻译时才使用此选项

name: Scene.show_more_options.label
ja_JP: その他のオプションを表示

name: Scene.merge_mode.armature.label
ja_JP: アーマチュアをマージ

name: Scene.merge_mode.armature.desc
en_US: Here you can merge two armatures together.
zh_CN: 在这里，您可以将两个骨架合并在一起。

name: Scene.merge_mode.mesh.label
ja_JP: メッシュを取り付ける

name: Scene.merge_mode.mesh.desc
en_US: Here you can attach a mesh to an armature.
zh_CN: 在这里，您可以将网格附加到骨架。

name: Scene.merge_armature_into.desc
en_US: Select the armature into which the other armature will be merged
zh_CN: 选择要合并其他骨架的骨架

name: Scene.merge_armature.label
ja_JP: メッシュを取り付ける

name: Scene.merge_armature.desc
en_US: Select the armature which will be merged into the selected armature above
zh_CN: 选择将合并到上面选定的骨架中的骨架

name: Scene.attach_to_bone.desc
en_US: Select the bone to which the armature will be attached to
zh_CN: 选择骨架将附加到的骨骼

name: Scene.attach_mesh.label
ja_JP: メッシュを取り付ける

name: Scene.attach_mesh.desc
en_US: Select the mesh which will be attached to the selected bone in the selected armature
zh_CN: 选择将附加到选定骨架中选定骨骼的网格

name: Scene.merge_same_bones.label
ja_JP: すべてのボーンをマージ

name: Scene.merge_same_bones.desc
en_US:
Merges all bones together that have the same name instead of only the base bones (Hips, Spine, etc).
You will have to make sure that all the bones you want to merge have the same name.

If this is checked, you won't need to fix the model with CATS beforehand but it is still advised to do so.
If this is unchecked, CATS will only merge the base bones (Hips, Spine, etc).

This can have unintended side effects, so check your model afterwards!
zh_CN:
将具有相同名称的所有骨骼合并在一起，而不仅仅是基础骨骼（臀部、脊柱等）。
您必须确保要合并的所有骨骼都具有相同的名称。

如果选中此项，则无需事先使用 CATS 修复模型，但仍建议您这样做。
如果未选中此项，CATS 将仅合并基础骨骼（臀部、脊柱等）。

这可能会产生意想不到的副作用，因此请稍后检查您的模型！

name: Scene.apply_transforms.desc
en_US:
Check this if both armatures and meshes are already at their correct positions.
This will cause them to stay exactly where they are when merging
zh_CN:
如果骨架和网格都已经在正确的位置，请检查此项。
这将导致它们在合并时准确地停留在原来的位置

name: Scene.merge_armatures_join_meshes.desc
en_US:
This will join all meshes.
Not checking this will always apply transforms
zh_CN:
这将连接所有网格。
不检查这将始终应用转换

name: Scene.merge_armatures_remove_zero_weight_bones.label
ja_JP: ゼロウェイトボーンを削除する

name: Scene.merge_armatures_remove_zero_weight_bones.desc
en_US:
Cleans up the bones hierarchy, deleting all bones that don't directly affect any vertices.
Uncheck this if bones or vertex groups that you want to keep got deleted
zh_CN:
清理骨骼层次，删除所有不直接影响任何顶点的骨骼。
如果要保留的骨骼或顶点组被删除，请取消选中此选项

name: Scene.merge_armatures_cleanup_shape_keys.desc
en_US:
Cleans up the meshes shape keys.
Uncheck this if shape keys you want to keep got deleted
zh_CN:
清理网格形状键。
如果要保留的形状键被删除，请取消选中此选项

name: Scene.decimation_mode.smart.desc
en_US:
Best results - repair shape keys after decimation

This will decimate your whole model and attempt to undo the warping caused by Blender's decimation.
This will give the best results and keep blinking and lip syncing, but may have issues on some models.
ko_KR:
최고의 결과 - 데시메이션 이후 쉐이프키들을 복구함

This will decimate your whole model and attempt to undo the warping caused by Blender's decimation.
This will give the best results and keep blinking and lip syncing, but may have issues on some models.
zh_CN:
最佳结果 - 精简后修复形态键

这将精简整个模型并尝试消除由 Blender 精简引起的扭曲。
这将提供最佳效果并保持眨眼和口型同步，但在某些型号上可能会出现问题。

name: Scene.decimation_mode.safe.desc
en_US:
Decent results - no shape key loss

This will only decimate meshes with no shape keys.
The results are decent and you won't lose any shape keys.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing will be fully preserved.
ko_KR:
괜찮은 결과 - 쉐이프키 손실 없음

This will only decimate meshes with no shape keys.
The results are decent and you won't lose any shape keys.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing will be fully preserved.
zh_CN:
体面的结果 - 没有形态键丢失

这只会精简没有形态键的网格。
结果不错，您不会丢失任何形态键。
眼睛追踪和唇形同步将完全保留。

name: Scene.decimation_mode.half.desc
en_US:
Good results - minimal shape key loss

This will only decimate meshes with less than 4 shape keys as those are often not used.
The results are better but you will lose the shape keys in some meshes.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing should still work.
ko_KR:
나쁘지 않은 결과, - 최소한의 쉐이프키 손실됨

This will only decimate meshes with less than 4 shape keys as those are often not used.
The results are better but you will lose the shape keys in some meshes.
Eye Tracking and Lip Syncing should still work.
zh_CN:
良好的结果 - 最小的形态键损失

这只会精简少于 4 个形态键的网格，因为它们通常不被使用。
结果更好，但您会丢失某些网格中的形态键。
眼睛追踪和唇形同步应该仍然有效。

name: Scene.decimation_mode.full.desc
en_US:
Consistent results - full shape key loss

This will decimate your whole model deleting all shape keys in the process.
This will give consistent results but you will lose the ability to add blinking and Lip Syncing.
Eye Tracking will still work if you disable Eye Blinking.
ko_KR:
일관된 결과 - 모든 쉐이프키들이 손실됨

This will decimate your whole model deleting all shape keys in the process.
This will give consistent results but you will lose the ability to add blinking and Lip Syncing.
Eye Tracking will still work if you disable Eye Blinking.
zh_CN:
一致的结果 - 完整的密钥丢失

这将大量删除您的整个模型，并在此过程中删除所有形态键。
这将提供一致的结果，但您将失去添加眨眼和唇形同步的能力。
如果您禁用眨眼，眼睛追踪仍然有效。

name: Scene.decimation_mode.custom.desc
en_US:
Custom results - custom shape key loss

This will let you choose which meshes and shape keys should not be decimated.
ko_KR:
커스텀 결과 - 커스텀 쉐이프키 손실

This will let you choose which meshes and shape keys should not be decimated.
zh_CN:
自定义结果 - 自定义形态键丢失

这将让您选择不应该精简哪些网格和形态键。

name: Scene.selection_mode.shapekeys.desc
en_US: Select all the shape keys you want to preserve here.
zh_CN: 在此处选择要保留的所有形态键。

name: Scene.selection_mode.meshes.desc
en_US: Select all the meshes you don't want to decimate here.
zh_CN: 在此处选择您不想精简的所有网格。

name: Scene.add_shape_key.desc
en_US: The shape key you want to keep

name: Scene.add_mesh.desc
en_US: The mesh you want to leave untouched by the decimation
zh_CN: 您希望保留不被精简影响的网格

name: Scene.decimate_fingers.desc
en_US:
Check this if you don't want to decimate your fingers!
Results will be worse but there will be no issues with finger movement.
This is probably only useful if you have a VR headset.

This operation requires the finger bones to be named specifically:
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
ko_KR:
손가락의 버텍스를 줄여 망치고 싶지 않다면 이것을 체크하세요!
결과는 더 나빠질 수 있지만 손의 움직임에는 문제가 없습니다.
아마 VR을 사용하는 경우에만 유용 할 것입니다.

이 작업을 수행하려면 손가락과 손 뼈의 이름을 구체적으로 지정해야합니다.
Left/Right wrist
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
zh_CN:
如果你不想毁掉你的手指，请检查这个！
结果会更糟，但手指移动不会有问题。
这可能仅在您拥有 VR 耳机时才有用。

此操作需要具体命名指骨：
拇指（0-2）_（左/右）
食指(1-3)_(L/R)
中指(1-3)_(L/R)
无名指(1-3)_(L/R)
小指(1-3)_(左/右)

name: Scene.decimate_hands.desc
en_US:
Check this if you don't want to decimate your full hands!
Results will be worse but there will be no issues with hand movement.
This is probably only useful if you have a VR headset.

This operation requires the finger and hand bones to be named specifically:
Left/Right wrist
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
ko_KR:
손의 버텍스를 줄여 망치고 싶지 않다면 이것을 체크하세요!
결과는 더 나빠질 수 있지만 손의 움직임에는 문제가 없습니다.
아마 VR을 사용하는 경우에만 유용 할 것입니다.

이 작업을 수행하려면 손가락과 손 뼈의 이름을 구체적으로 지정해야합니다.
Left/Right wrist
Thumb(0-2)_(L/R)
IndexFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
MiddleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
RingFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
LittleFinger(1-3)_(L/R)
zh_CN:
如果你不想毁掉你的全部手，请检查这个！
结果会更糟，但手部移动不会有问题。
这可能仅在您拥有 VR 耳机时才有用。

此操作需要具体命名手指和手骨：
左/右手腕
拇指（0-2）_（左/右）
食指(1-3)_(L/R)
中指(1-3)_(L/R)
无名指(1-3)_(L/R)
小指(1-3)_(左/右)

name: Scene.decimation_remove_doubles.desc
en_US: Uncheck this if you get issues with this checked
ja_JP: Uncheck this if you got issues with with this checked
zh_CN: 如果您对此检查有问题，请取消选中此选项

name: Scene.decimation_animation_weighting.desc
en_US:
Weight decimation based on shape keys and vertex group overlap
Results in better animating topology by trading off overall shape accuracy
Use if your elbows/joints end up with bad topology
zh_CN:
基于形态键和顶点组重叠的权重精简
通过权衡整体形状精度来产生更好的动画拓扑
如果您的肘部/关节最终出现不良拓扑结构，请使用

name: Scene.decimation_animation_weighting_factor.desc
en_US: How much influence the animation weighting has on the overall shape
zh_CN: 动画权重对整体形状的影响有多大

name: Scene.max_tris.desc
en_US: The target amount of tris after decimation

name: Scene.eye_mode.creation.desc
en_US: Here you can create eye tracking.
zh_CN: 在这里您可以创建眼睛追踪。

name: Scene.eye_mode.testing.desc
en_US: Here you can test how eye tracking will look in-game.
zh_CN: 在这里，您可以测试眼睛追踪在游戏中的外观。

name: Scene.mesh_name_eye.desc
en_US: The mesh with the eyes vertex groups
zh_CN: 带有眼睛顶点组的网格

name: Scene.head.desc
en_US: The head bone containing the eye bones

name: Scene.wink_left.desc
en_US: The shape key containing a blink with the left eye
zh_CN: 包含左眼眨眼的形态键

name: Scene.wink_right.desc
en_US: The shape key containing a blink with the right eye
zh_CN: 包含右眼眨眼的形态键

name: Scene.lowerlid_left.desc
en_US:
The shape key containing a slightly raised left lower lid.
Can be set to "Basis" to disable lower lid movement
zh_CN:
包含略微凸起的左下盖的形态键。
可以设置为"基础"以禁用下眼睑移动

name: Scene.lowerlid_right.desc
en_US:
The shape key containing a slightly raised right lower lid.
Can be set to "Basis" to disable lower lid movement
zh_CN:
包含略微凸起的右下盖的形态键。
可以设置为"基础"以禁用下眼睑移动

name: Scene.disable_eye_movement.label
ja_JP: 目の動きを無効にする

name: Scene.disable_eye_movement.desc
en_US:
IMPORTANT: Do your decimation first if you check this!

Disables eye movement. Useful if you only want blinking.
This creates eye bones with no movement bound to them.
You still have to assign "LeftEye" and "RightEye" to the eyes in Unity
zh_CN:
重要提示：如果您选中此项，请先进行精简！

禁用眼睛移动。 如果您只想闪烁，则很有用。
这会创建没有移动约束的眼骨。
你仍然需要在 Unity 中为眼睛分配"LeftEye"和"RightEye"

name: Scene.disable_eye_blinking.desc
en_US:
Disables eye blinking. Useful if you only want eye movement.
This will create the necessary shape keys but leaves them empty
zh_CN:
禁用眼睛眨眼。 如果您只想要眼睛移动，这很有用。
这将创建必要的形态键，但将它们留空

name: Scene.eye_distance.desc
en_US:
Higher = more eye movement
Lower = less eye movement
Warning: Too little or too much range can glitch the eyes.
Test your results in the "Eye Testing"-Tab!
zh_CN:
更高 = 更多眼球移动
较低 = 较少的眼球移动
警告：太小或太大的范围都会使眼睛出现故障。
在"眼睛测试"选项卡中测试您的结果！

name: Scene.eye_rotation_x.desc
en_US: Rotate the eye bones on the vertical axis
zh_CN: 在垂直轴上旋转眼睛骨骼

name: Scene.eye_rotation_y.desc
en_US:
Rotate the eye bones on the horizontal axis.
This is from your own point of view
zh_CN:
在水平轴上旋转眼睛骨骼。
这是从你自己的角度

name: Scene.iris_height.desc
en_US: Moves the iris away from the eye ball

name: Scene.eye_blink_shape.desc
en_US: Test the blinking of the eye

name: Scene.eye_lowerlid_shape.desc
en_US: Test the lowerlid blinking of the eye

name: Scene.mesh_name_viseme.desc
en_US: The mesh with the mouth shape keys

name: Scene.mouth_a.desc
en_US:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "aa".
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
zh_CN:
形态键包含看起来有人在说"aa"的嘴巴动作。
不要在这里放像"Basis"这样的空形态键

name: Scene.mouth_o.desc
en_US:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "oh".
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
zh_CN:
包含看起来有人在说"哦"的嘴巴动作的形态键。
不要在这里放像"Basis"这样的空形态键

name: Scene.mouth_ch.desc
en_US:
Shape key containing mouth movement that looks like someone is saying "ch". Opened lips and clenched teeth.
Do not put empty shape keys like "Basis" in here
zh_CN:
形态键包含看起来有人在说"ch"的嘴巴动作。 张开嘴唇，咬紧牙关。
不要在这里放像"Basis"这样的空形态键

name: Scene.shape_intensity.label
ja_JP: シェイプキーミックスの強度

name: Scene.shape_intensity.desc
en_US: Controls the strength in the creation of the shape keys. Lower for less mouth movement strength
zh_CN: 控制创建形态键的强度。 降低嘴巴移动强度

name: Scene.root_bone.desc
en_US: List of bones that look like they could be parented together to a root bone
zh_CN: 看起来可以作为根骨骼的父级的骨骼列表

name: Scene.optimize_mode.atlas.desc
en_US: Allows you to make a texture atlas.

name: Scene.optimize_mode.material.desc
en_US: Some various options on material manipulation.
zh_CN: 关于材质操作的一些不同选项。

name: Scene.optimize_mode.bonemerging.desc
en_US: Allows child bones to be merged into their parents.
zh_CN: 允许子骨骼合并到它们的父骨骼中。

name: Scene.merge_ratio.desc
en_US:
Higher = more bones will be merged
Lower = less bones will be merged
zh_CN:
更高 = 更多骨骼将被合并
较低 = 更少的骨骼将被合并

name: Scene.merge_mesh.desc
en_US: The mesh with the bones vertex groups
zh_CN: 具有骨骼顶点组的网格

name: Scene.merge_bone.desc
en_US: List of bones that look like they could be merged together to reduce overall bones
zh_CN: 看起来可以合并在一起以减少整体骨骼的骨骼列表

name: Scene.show_avatar_2_tabs.desc
en_US: Show tools specific to legacy versions of the Avatar API
zh_CN: 显示特定于旧版 Avatar API 的工具

name: Scene.show_mmd_tabs.desc
en_US: Allows you to hide/show the mmd_tools tabs "MMD" and "Misc"
zh_CN: 允许您隐藏/显示 mmd_tools 选项卡"MMD"和"Misc"

name: Scene.embed_textures.label
ja_JP: エクスポート時にテクスチャを埋め込む

name: Scene.embed_textures.desc
en_US:
Enable this to embed the texture files into the FBX file upon export.
Unity will automatically extract these textures and put them into a separate folder.
This might not work for everyone and it increases the file size of the exported FBX file
zh_CN:
启用此选项可在导出时将纹理文件嵌入到 FBX 文件中。
Unity 会自动提取这些纹理并将它们放入单独的文件夹中。
这可能不适用于所有人，并且会增加导出的 FBX 文件的文件大小

name: Scene.ui_lang.desc
en_US: Lets you select which language the Cats interface should have
zh_CN: 让您选择 Cats 界面应具有的语言

name: Scene.use_custom_mmd_tools.desc
en_US: Enable this to use your own version of mmd_tools. This will disable the internal cats mmd_tools
zh_CN: 启用它以使用您自己的 mmd_tools 版本。 这将禁用内部猫 mmd_tools

name: Scene.debug_translations.desc
en_US: Tests the Google Translations and prints the Google response in case of error
zh_CN: 测试 Google 翻译并在出现错误时打印 Google 响应

name: Scene.bake_resolution.desc
en_US:
Output resolution for the textures.
- 2048 is typical for desktop use.
- 1024 is reccomended for the Quest
ko_KR:
테스쳐들의 결과 해상도.
- 2048 데스크탑 용
- 1024 퀘스트 용
zh_CN:
纹理的输出分辨率。
- 2048 是典型的桌面使用。
- 建议 1024 用于 Quest

name: Scene.bake_use_decimation.desc
en_US: Reduce polycount before baking, then use Normal maps to restore detail
ko_KR: 베이킹하기 전에 폴리 카운트를 줄인 다음 노멀 맵을 사용하여 디테일을 복원합니다.
zh_CN: 烘焙前减少多边形数，然后使用法线贴图恢复细节

name: Scene.bake_generate_uvmap.desc
en_US:
Re-pack islands for your mesh to a new non-overlapping UVMap.
Only disable if your UVs are non-overlapping already.
This will leave any map named "Detail Map" alone.
Uses UVPackMaster where available for more efficient UVs, make sure the window is showing
zh_CN:
将网格的岛屿重新打包到新的非重叠 UVMap。
仅当您的 UV 已经不重叠时才禁用。
这将留下任何名为"详细地图"的地图。
在可用的地方使用 UVPackMaster 以获得更有效的 UV，确保显示窗口

name: Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.desc
en_US: Method used to prevent overlaps in UVMap
zh_CN: 用于防止 UVMap 中重叠的方法

name: Scene.bake_prioritize_face.desc
en_US: Scale any UV islands attached to the head/eyes by a given factor.
zh_CN: 按给定因子缩放连接到头部/眼睛的任何 UV 岛。

name: Scene.bake_face_scale.desc
en_US: How much to scale up the face/eyes portion of the textures.
zh_CN: 将纹理的面部/眼睛部分放大多少。

name: Scene.bake_quick_compare.desc
en_US: Move output avatar next to existing one to quickly compare
zh_CN: 将输出头像移动到现有头像旁边以快速比较

name: Scene.bake_illuminate_eyes.desc
en_US:
Relight LeftEye and RightEye to be full brightness.
Without this, the eyes will have the shadow of the surrounding socket baked in,
which doesn't animate well
zh_CN:
重新点亮 LeftEye 和 RightEye 以达到全亮度。
没有这个，眼睛就会有周围眼窝的阴影烤进去，
动画效果不好

name: Scene.bake_pass_smoothness.desc
en_US:
Bakes Roughness and then inverts the values.
To use this, it needs to be packed to the Alpha channel of either Diffuse or Metallic.
Not neccesary if your mesh has a global roughness value
zh_CN:
烘焙粗糙度，然后反转值。
要使用它，它需要被打包到 Diffuse 或 Metallic 的 Alpha 通道。
如果您的网格具有全局粗糙度值，则不需要

name: Scene.bake_pass_diffuse.desc
en_US:
Bakes diffuse, un-lighted color. Usually you will want this.
While baking, this temporarily links "Metallic" to "Anisotropic Rotation" as metallic can cause issues.
zh_CN:
烘烤漫射、未点亮的颜色。 通常你会想要这个。
烘烤时，这会暂时将"金属"链接到"各向异性旋转"，因为金属会导致问题。

name: Scene.bake_preserve_seams.desc
en_US:
Forces the Decimate operation to preserve vertices making up seams, preventing hard edges along seams.
May result in less ideal geometry.
Use if you notice ugly edges along your texture seams.
zh_CN:
强制精简操作以保留构成接缝的顶点，防止沿接缝的硬边。
可能导致不太理想的几何形状。
如果您发现纹理接缝处有丑陋的边缘，请使用。

name: Scene.bake_pass_normal.desc
en_US:
Bakes a normal (bump) map. Allows you to keep the shading of a complex object with
the geometry of a simple object. If you have selected 'Decimate', it will create a map
that makes the low res output look like the high res input.
Will not work well if you have self-intersecting islands
zh_CN:
烘焙法线（凹凸）贴图。 允许您使用
简单物体的几何形状。 如果您选择了"精简"，它将创建一个地图
这使得低分辨率输出看起来像高分辨率输入。
如果您有自相交的岛屿，将无法正常工作

name: Scene.bake_normal_apply_trans.desc
en_US:
Applies offsets while baking normals. Neccesary if your model has many materials with different normal maps
Turn this off if applying location causes problems with your model
zh_CN:
在烘焙法线时应用偏移。 如果您的模型有许多具有不同法线贴图的材质，则这是必需的
如果应用位置导致模型出现问题，请关闭此功能

name: Scene.bake_pass_ao.desc
en_US:
Bakes Ambient Occlusion, non-projected shadows. Adds a significant amount of detail to your model.
Reccomended for non-toon style avatars.
Takes a fairly long time to bake
zh_CN:
烘焙环境光遮蔽，非投影阴影。 为您的模型添加大量细节。
推荐用于非卡通风格的头像。
需要相当长的时间来烘烤

name: Scene.bake_pass_displacement.desc
en_US:
Bakes a normalized Displacement map, according to the material displacement in Blender.
Can add real 3d surface detail to models.
Results are in Linear space, so make sure uncheck Color Texture in Unity.
zh_CN:
根据 Blender 中的材质置换，烘焙归一化的置换贴图。
可以为模型添加真实的 3d 表面细节。
结果在线性空间中，因此请确保取消选中 Unity 中的颜色纹理。

name: Scene.bake_pass_questdiffuse.desc
en_US: Blends the result of the Diffuse and AO bakes to make Quest-compatible shading.
zh_CN: 混合漫反射和 AO 烘焙的结果以制作与 Quest 兼容的着色。

name: Scene.bake_diffuse_alpha_pack.desc
en_US: What to pack to the Diffuse Alpha channel
zh_CN: 将什么打包到 Diffuse Alpha 通道

name: Scene.bake_metallic_alpha_pack.desc
en_US: What to pack to the Metallic Alpha channel
zh_CN: 将什么打包到 Metallic Alpha 通道

name: Scene.bake_pass_alpha.desc
en_US:
Bakes transparency by connecting the last Principled BSDF Alpha input
to the Base Color input and baking Diffuse.
Not a native pass in Blender, results may vary
Unused if you are baking to Quest
zh_CN:
通过连接最后一个 Principled BSDF Alpha 输入来烘焙透明度
到基础颜色输入和烘焙漫反射。
不是 Blender 中的原生通道，结果可能会有所不同
如果您正在烘焙到 Quest，则未使用

name: Scene.bake_pass_metallic.desc
en_US:
Bakes metallic by connecting the last Principled BSDF Metallic input
to the Base Color input and baking Diffuse.
Not a native pass in Blender, results may vary
zh_CN:
通过连接最后一个 Principled BSDF Metallic 输入来烘烤金属
到基础颜色输入和烘焙漫反射。
不是 Blender 中的原生通道，结果可能会有所不同

name: Scene.bake_questdiffuse_opacity.desc
en_US:
The opacity of the shadows to blend onto the Diffuse map.
This should match the unity slider for AO on the Desktop version.
zh_CN:
混合到漫反射贴图上的阴影的不透明度。
这应该与桌面版 AO 的统一滑块相匹配。

name: Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.none.desc
en_US: Leave islands as they are. Use if islands don't self-intersect at all
zh_CN: 让岛屿保持原样。 如果岛屿根本不自相交，则使用

name: Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.unmirror.desc
en_US: Move all face islands with positive X values over one to un-pin mirrored UVs. Solves most UV pinning issues.
zh_CN: 将所有具有正 X 值的面岛移动到 1 以取消固定镜像 UV。 解决了大多数 UV 固定问题。

name: Scene.bake_uv_overlap_correction.reproject.desc
en_US: Use blender's Smart UV Project to come up with an entirely new island layout. Tends to reduce quality.
zh_CN: 使用blender的智能紫外线项目来设计一个全新的岛屿布局。 倾向于降低质量。

name: Scene.bake_diffuse_alpha_pack.smoothness.desc
en_US: Pack Smoothness. Most efficient if you don't have transparency or metallic textures.
zh_CN: 包平滑度。 如果您没有透明度或金属纹理，则最有效。

name: Scene.bake_metallic_alpha_pack.smoothness.desc
en_US: Pack Smoothness. Use this if your Diffuse alpha channel is already populated with Transparency
zh_CN: 包平滑度。 如果您的漫反射 alpha 通道已经填充了透明度，请使用此选项

name: cats_bake.warn_missing_nodes
en_US: A material in use isn't using Nodes, fix this in the Shading tab.
zh_CN: 正在使用的材质未使用节点，请在"着色"选项卡中修复此问题。

name: cats_bake.preset_desktop.desc
en_US:
Preset for producing an Excellent-rated Desktop avatar, not accounting for bones.
This will try to automatically detect which bake passes are relevant to your model
zh_CN:
用于制作优秀桌面头像的预设，不考虑骨骼。
这将尝试自动检测哪些烘焙通道与您的模型相关

name: cats_bake.preset_quest.desc
en_US:
Preset for producing an Excellent-rated Quest avatar, not accounting for bones.
This will try to automatically detect which bake passes are relevant to your model
zh_CN:
用于制作优秀 Quest 头像的预设，不考虑骨骼。
这将尝试自动检测哪些烘焙通道与您的模型相关

name: cats_bake.bake.desc
en_US:
Perform the bake. Warning, this performs an actual render!
This will create a copy of your avatar to leave the original alone.
Depending on your machine and model, this could take an hour or more.
For each pass, any Value node in your materials labeled bake_<bakename> will be
set to 1.0, for more granular customization.
zh_CN:
执行烘烤。 警告，这将执行实际渲染！
这将创建您的头像的副本，以保留原始头像。
根据您的机器和型号，这可能需要一个小时或更长时间。
对于每个通道，您的材质中标记为 bake_<bakename> 的任何值节点都将是
设置为 1.0，以获得更精细的自定义。

name: cats_bake.error.render_engine
en_US: You need to set your render engine to Cycles first!
zh_CN: 您需要先将渲染引擎设置为 Cycles！

name: cats_bake.error.render_disabled
en_US: One or more of your armature's meshes have rendering disabled!
zh_CN: 您的一个或多个骨架网格体已禁用渲染！

name: cats_bake.info.success
en_US: Success! Textures and model saved to 'CATS Bake' folder next to your .blend file.
zh_CN: 成功！纹理和模型保存在 .blend 文件旁边的"CATS Bake"文件夹中。

name: cats_bake.tutorial_button.desc
en_US: This will open the Cats wiki page for the Bake panel
zh_CN: 这将打开烘焙面板的 Cats wiki 教程页面

name: CheckForUpdateButton.label
ja_JP: 今すぐアップデートを確認

name: CheckForUpdateButton.desc
en_US: Checks if a new update is available for CATS
zh_CN: 检查是否有适用于 CATS 的新更新

name: UpdateToLatestButton.desc
en_US: Update CATS to the latest version

name: bake_the_effect_of_emission_on_nearby_surfaces_results_in_much_more_realistic_lighting_effects_but_can_animate_less_well
en_US: Bake the effect of emission on nearby surfaces. Results in much more realistic lighting effects, but can animate less well.
zh_CN: 在附近的表面上烘焙发射效果。 产生更逼真的照明效果，但动画效果较差。

name: bakes_the_effect_of_any_eye_glow_onto_surrounding_objects_but_not_viceversa_improves_animation_when_eyes_are_moving_around
en_US: Bakes the effect of any eye glow onto surrounding objects, but not vice-versa. Improves animation when eyes are moving around..
zh_CN: 将任何眼睛发光的效果烘焙到周围的物体上，但反之则不行。 改善眼睛四处移动时的动画效果。

name: blends_emission_into_the_diffuse_map_for_engines_without_a_seperate_emission_map
en_US: Blends emission into the diffuse map, for engines without a seperate emission map
zh_CN: 将排放混合到漫反射贴图中，用于没有单独排放贴图的引擎

name: convert_diffuse_and_metallic_to_premultiplied_diffuse_and_specular_compatible_with_older_engines
en_US: Convert Diffuse and Metallic to premultiplied Diffuse and Specular. Compatible with older engines
zh_CN: 将漫反射和金属转换为预乘漫反射和镜面反射。 与旧引擎兼容

name: denoise_the_resulting_image_after_emitao_reccomended_as_this_will_reduce_the_grainy_quality_of_inexpensive_rendering
en_US: Denoise the resulting image after emit/AO. Reccomended as this will reduce the 'grainy' quality of inexpensive rendering..
zh_CN: 在发射/AO 之后对生成的图像进行去噪。 推荐，因为这会降低廉价渲染的"颗粒状"质量。

name: device_to_bake_on_gpu_gives_a_significant_speedup_but_can_cause_issues_depending_on_your_graphics_drivers
en_US: Device to bake on. GPU gives a significant speedup, but can cause issues depending on your graphics drivers.
zh_CN: 要烘烤的设备。 GPU 提供了显着的加速，但根据您的图形驱动程序可能会导致问题。

name: experimental_try_to_keep_uvps_lock_overlapping_enabled
en_US: Experimental. Try to keep UVP's lock overlapping enabled
zh_CN: 实验性的。 尝试保持启用 UVP 的锁定重叠

name: for_source_engine_only_provides_diffuse_lighting_reflections_for_nonmetallic_objects
en_US: For Source engine only. Provides diffuse lighting reflections for nonmetallic objects.
zh_CN: 仅适用于 Source 引擎。 为非金属物体提供漫反射照明。

name: generate_an_additional_lod_used_for_simplified_physics_interactions
en_US: Generate an additional LOD used for simplified physics interactions
zh_CN: 生成用于简化物理交互的附加 LOD

name: generate_courser_decimation_levels_for_efficient_rendering
en_US: Generate courser decimation levels for efficient rendering.
zh_CN: 生成更粗的抽取级别以实现高效渲染。

name: generate_the_twistbones_on_the_upper_half_of_the_bone_usually_used_for_upper_legs
en_US: Generate the twistbones on the upper half of the bone. Usually used for upper legs.
zh_CN: 在骨骼的上半部分生成扭曲骨骼。 通常用于大腿。

name: ignore_currently_hidden_objects_when_copying
en_US: Ignore currently hidden objects when copying
zh_CN: 复制时忽略当前隐藏的对象

name: image_type_to_use_when_exporting
en_US: image type to use when exporting
zh_CN: 导出时使用的图像类型

name: lod_generation_levels_as_a_percent_of_the_max_tris
en_US: LOD generation levels, as a percent of the max tris
zh_CN: LOD 生成级别，作为最大 tris 的百分比

name: max_bones_per_prop
zh_CN: 每个道具的最大骨骼数

name: maximum_bones_a_prop_can_be_attached_to_to_be_considered_a_prop_more_will_create_more_toggleable_props_but_increase_armature_complexity
en_US: Maximum bones a prop can be attached to to be considered a prop. More will create more toggleable props, but increase armature complexity.
zh_CN: 道具可以附加到的最大骨骼被视为道具。 更多将创建更多可切换的道具，但会增加骨架复杂性。

name: merge_any_bone_with_twist_in_the_name_useful_as_quest_does_not_support_constraints
en_US: Merge any bone with 'Twist' in the name. Useful as Quest does not support constraints.
zh_CN: 合并名称中带有"Twist"的任何骨骼。 有用，因为 Quest 不支持约束。

name: merges_smoothness_into_the_specular_map_for_engines_without_a_seperate_smoothness_map
en_US: Merges smoothness into the specular map, for engines without a seperate smoothness map
zh_CN: 将平滑度合并到高光贴图中，用于没有单独平滑度贴图的引擎

name: model_format_to_use_when_exporting
en_US: Model format to use when exporting
zh_CN: 导出时使用的模型格式

name: optimizes_solid_materials_by_making_a_small_area_for_them_ao_pass_will_nullify
en_US: Optimizes solid materials by making a small area for them. AO pass will nullify
zh_CN: 通过为固体材料制作小面积来优化固体材料。 AO 通行证将失效

name: pack_ambient_occlusion_to_the_green_channel_saves_a_texture_as_unity_uses_g_for_ao_r_for_metallic
en_US: Pack Ambient Occlusion to the Green channel. Saves a texture as Unity uses G for AO, R for Metallic.
zh_CN: 将 Ambient Occlusion 打包到绿色通道。 保存纹理，因为 Unity 使用 G 表示 AO，R 表示金属。

name: pack_ao_to_metallic_green
zh_CN: 将 AO 包装成金属绿

name: rebake_to_vertex_colors_after_initial_bake_avoids_an_entire_extra_texture_if_your_colors_are_simple_enough_incorperates_ao
en_US: Rebake to vertex colors after initial bake. Avoids an entire extra texture, if your colors are simple enough. Incorperates AO.
zh_CN: 初始烘焙后重新烘焙到顶点颜色。 如果您的颜色足够简单，可以避免整个额外的纹理。 包含AO。

name: remove_backup_shapekeys_in_the_final_result_eg_key__reverted_or_blinkold
en_US: Remove backup shapekeys in the final result, e.g. 'Key1 - Reverted' or 'blink_old'
zh_CN: 在最终结果中删除备份 shapekey，例如 'Key1 - Reverted' 或 'blink_old'

name: select_this_to_keep_the_bones_after_merging_them_to_their_parents_or_to_the_active_bone
en_US: Select this to keep the bones after merging them to their parents or to the active bone
zh_CN: 选择此项以在将骨骼合并到其父级或活动骨骼后保留骨骼

name: select_this_to_only_merge_the_weights_of_the_visible_meshes
en_US: Select this to only merge the weights of the visible meshes
zh_CN: 选择此项仅合并可见网格的权重

name: seperate_vertices_unaffected_by_shape_keys_into_their_own_mesh_this_adds_a_drawcall_but_comes_with_a_significant_gpu_cost_savings_especially_on_mobile
en_US: Seperate vertices unaffected by shape keys into their own mesh. This adds a drawcall, but comes with a significant GPU cost savings, especially on mobile.
zh_CN: 将不受形状键影响的顶点分离到它们自己的网格中。 这增加了一次绘图调用，但显着节省了 GPU 成本，尤其是在移动设备上。

name: sharpen_resampled_images_after_baking_diffusesmoothnessmetallic_reccomended_as_any_sampling_will_cause_blur
en_US: Sharpen resampled images after baking diffuse/smoothness/metallic. Reccomended as any sampling will cause blur.
zh_CN: 烘焙漫反射/平滑/金属后锐化重新采样的图像。 推荐，因为任何采样都会导致模糊。

name: source_engine_uses_an_inverse_green_channel_this_fixes_that_on_export
en_US: Source engine uses an inverse green channel, this fixes that on export
zh_CN: 源引擎使用反向绿色通道，这修复了导出时的问题

name: target_another_bone_naming_standard_when_exporting_requires_standard_bone_names
en_US: Target another bone naming standard when exporting. Requires standard bone names
zh_CN: 导出时以另一个骨骼命名标准为目标。 需要标准骨骼名称

name: the_angle_reproject_uses_when_unwrapping_larger_angles_yield_less_islands_but_more_stretching_and_smaller_does_opposite
en_US: The angle Reproject uses when unwrapping. Larger angles yield less islands but more stretching and smaller does opposite
zh_CN: 展开时 Reproject 使用的角度。 更大的角度产生更少的岛屿，但更多的拉伸和更小的相反

name: this_option_will_detect_any_meshes_weighted_to_a_single_bone_and_create_a_prop_bone_you_can_independently_scale_to_
en_US: This option will detect any meshes weighted to a single bone and create a 'prop' bone you can independently scale to 0.
zh_CN: 此选项将检测任何加权到单个骨骼的网格并创建一个可以独立缩放到 0 的"道具"骨骼。

name: what_to_pack_to_the_alpha_channel_of_specularity
en_US: What to pack to the Alpha channel of Specularity
zh_CN: 将什么打包到 Specularity 的 Alpha 通道

en_US: When selected, currently active shape keys will be applied to the basis. This is extremely beneficial to performance if your avatar is intended to 'default' to one shapekey
zh_CN: 选中后，当前活动的形状键将应用于基础。 如果您的头像打算"默认"为一个 shapekey，这对性能非常有利

name: mix
en_US: as having active shapekeys all the time is expensive. Keys ending in '_bake' are always applied to the basis and removed completely, regardless of this option.
zh_CN: 因为一直有活动的 shapekey 是很昂贵的。 无论此选项如何，以"_bake"结尾的键始终应用于基础并完全删除。

name: while_not_technically_accurate_this_avoids_the_shine_effect_on_obscured_portions_of_your_model
en_US: While not technically accurate, this avoids the 'shine effect' on obscured portions of your model
zh_CN: 虽然技术上不准确，但这避免了模型模糊部分的"光泽效应"

name: will_show_extra_options_related_to_applicable_bones_and_texture_packing_setups
en_US: Will show extra options related to applicable bones and texture packing setups.
zh_CN: 将显示与适用的骨骼和纹理打包设置相关的额外选项。

name: will_show_extra_options_related_to_which_bake_passes_are_performed_and_how
en_US: Will show extra options related to which bake passes are performed and how.
zh_CN: 将显示与执行哪些烘焙通道以及如何执行相关的额外选项。
